import React, {useState} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import toast, { Toaster } from 'react-hot-toast'; import "../App.css"; import {useNavigate,Link } from "react-router-dom"; import {useForm} from 'react-hook-form'; const SignUp = () => { const [loader, setLoader] = useState(false); const {register, handleSubmit, formState:{errors}} = useForm(); const navigate = useNavigate(); // const handleChanges = (e) => // { // setFormDate({ // ...formDate, // [e.target.name]: e.target.value // }) // } const handleFormSubmit = async (e) => { setLoader(true); console.log("aloo"); try { const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/api/register', register); console.log(response.data); setLoader(false); toast.success('You have been registered successfully!'); setTimeout(() =>{ navigate('/auth/confirmEmail') },1000) } catch (err) { setLoader(false); if (err.response && err.response.data) { const errorResponse = err.response.data; if (errorResponse.details) { const validationMessages = errorResponse.details .map((detail) => detail.message) .join(', '); toast.error(`Validation Error: ${validationMessages}`); } else if (errorResponse.msg) { toast.error(`Error: ${errorResponse.msg}`); } } else { const generalErrorMessage = `There was an error: ${err.message}`; toast.error(generalErrorMessage); } console.log('Error occurred during form submission:', err); } }; return (
{errors && typeof errors === 'string' && errors.trim() !== '' && (
